# Reports Directory

This directory contains generated reports and results from the Machine Learning project.

## Output Files

### salary_prediction_results.csv
- Contains predictions from regression models
- Columns: Actual Salary, Predicted Salary (RF), Predicted Salary (LR), Residuals
- Used for analysis and evaluation of model performance

## Analysis Results

- Model comparison metrics
- Feature importance rankings
- Salary trends by experience, country, and education
- Fairness classification results

## Generated Files

Reports and results are automatically saved here when running:
```bash
bash run.sh
```
